page.title: 17Leisure activities
page.content: We tried to find out what people did on{Saturday, 22nd June}and{Sunday,23rd {June,1985}.We hoped this would show us how families spend their time. There are a lot of{places of interest in our area.80 people went to a place of interest,like a museum or a zoo. 65 people went{shopping}because people need to eat food .Shopping is good at Portsmouth, Fareham and Southampton. Not many people{stayed at home}on Saturday and Sunday.{Television}came third because the programmes are interesting and adults like to watch the news.Next we put some{water {activities}together .37 people went fishing ,swimming or to the beach. Not many people go a{theatre}or{cinema}. 28 people went to{visit their family because they like to .
